output_list.reason: The 'mint' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the totalSupply variable.
The 'buyPreSaleTokens' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the buyer's balance.
The 'buyPreSaleTokens' function allows any caller designated as 'icoAgent' to mint tokens for any buyer, without any access controls.
The 'mint' function allows any caller designated as 'preSale' to mint tokens for any holder, without any access controls.
The 'PreSaleStarted' event emission does not prevent overflow of the totalSupply variable.
